Boundary Level: level 115.2 on platform IV of the geological site at Tercis les Bains
Correlation Events: Mean of 12 biostratigraphic criteria of equal importance. Closely above is FAD of ammonite Pachydiscus neubergicus. Boreal proxy is FAD of belemnite Belemnella lanceolata.

GSSP Location: candidates are in southern England and in Texas

Boundary Level: 94.4 m in the Cantera de Margas quarry section
Correlation Events: the FO of the inoceramid bivalve Platyceramus undulatoplicatus

Boundary Level: base of Bed 46 in the Salzgitter-Salder section
Correlation Events: first occurrence of the inoceramid Cremnoceramus deformis erectus

Boundary Level: base of Bed 86 of the Bridge Creek Limestone Member
36 meters below the top of the Marnes Bleues Formation on the south side of Mont Risou

GSSP Location: Col de Pré-Guittard, Department of Drôme, southeastern France
Boundary Level: 37.4 m above the base of the section and 0.4 m above the base of the laminated Niveau Kilian bed
Correlation Events: Lowest occurrence of the planktonic foraminifer Microhedbergella renilaevis

GSSP Location: candidate is Gorgo a Cerbara, Piobbico, Umbria-Marche, central Italy
Correlation Events: Magnetic - base of Chron M0r; near FAD of Paradeshayesites oglanlensis ammonite zone

GSSP Location: candidate is Río Argos near Caravaca, Murcia Province, Spain
Correlation Events: Ammonite FAD Spitidiscus hugii - Spitidiscus vandeckii group

GSSP Location: La Charce, Department of Drôme, southeastern France
Boundary Level: base of bed 189 in the La Charce section
Correlation Events: First occurrence of the ammonite genus Acanthodiscus which marks the base of the Acanthodiscus radiatus ammonite Zone

GSSP Location: candidates are near Montbrunles- Bains (Drôme province, SE France) and Cañada Luenga (Betic Cordillera, S. Spain)
Correlation Events: Calpionellid FAD Calpionellites darderi (base of Calpionellid Zone E); followed by ammonite FAD "Thurmanniceras" pertransiens
Candidates include: (1) Magnetic - base of Chron M18r, (2) Base of Calpionellid zone B, (3) ammonite FAD of Berriasella jacobi
